nodes.bodyText:
figured I'd ping you @jrodewig because of this docs change :)
also, more generally, wasn't sure what the deal with the + is

nodes.bodyText:
Thanks for the ping @talevy. The + includes the other paragraph in the <rollup_index> def.
I pushed 4d0fa5a to relocate the para and make some other minor fixes. However, this looks great overall!

nodes.bodyText:
nit: Maybe this should be PUT /<index>/_rollup/<rollup-index>
use a - instead of _ for consistency with the rest of the docs (I was looking at roll-over docs)
Good call. I've fixed this up with efd2db0.
